questions.question: In the following sentence identify Coordinating conjunction.
questions.comprehension: Sometime later , a few hunters captured the lion , and tied him to a tree .

questions.question: In the following sentence identify Personal pronoun.
questions.comprehension: After that they went in search of a wagon , to take him to the zoo .

questions.question: In the following sentence identify Preposition or subordinating conjunction.
questions.comprehension: The lion was so tickled by the idea of the mouse being able to help him that he lifted his paw and let him go .

questions.question: In the following sentence identify Determiner.
questions.comprehension: Sometime later , a few hunters captured the lion , and tied him to a tree .
